title: My phone began to make gurgling sounds when its screen was locked. What is it?
content: I ran into that problem a day ago. I have already done everything that was suggested in this topic (https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/3705680?hl=ru ). It's not NFC, reset of notifications doesn't help either, moreover, this sound also happens in "Don't disturb" mode. What is it and how do I turn it off? I'm going crazy right now because of that sound.
